entities.name: police
entities.description: The police are mentioned as the ones who received the report and were investigating the case.

entities.name: doctors
entities.description: A team of doctors examined the bodies and concluded that none of the Riddles had been harmed.

entities.name: Riddles
entities.description: The Riddles are mentioned as a family who were found dead under mysterious circumstances.

entities.name: Frank
entities.description: Frank is mentioned as someone who was let go by the police due to lack of evidence.

entities.name: Little Hangleton churchyard
entities.description: The Riddles were buried in this churchyard.

relationships.description: The police investigated the case of the Riddles.
A team of doctors examined the bodies of the Riddles.
The police released Frank due to lack of evidence.
